name: Diffraction
storyline:
Being a photography-based influencer was the goal, but everyone called it a pipe dream - and they were right.

A "failed" career, no job, no money, and a mountain of debt, April ends up moving back to her rainy small town. But even a small town has some doors for opportunity if two boys can give her one last shot at her dreams. She can use them.
summary:
Little otome visual novel with a focus on connections and friendship.

A slice-of-life and coming-of-age story on how photography changed the lives of three people in a rainy small town and the paths in life they took with it.
